Package com.pb.identify.identifyAddress.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseAddress
    Base class for ValidateMailingAddress input
    BaseOptions
    Base class for ValidateMailingAddress input options
    BaseResponse
    Base Response class for ValidateMailingAddress API
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CanDeliveryOfficeFormat
    Enum to specify where to place station information.
    CanDualAddressLogic
    Enum to specify whether ValidateAddress should return a street match or a PO Box/non-civic match when the address contains both civic and non-civic information.
    CanEnglishApartmentLabel
    Enum to Specify For English addresses, specifies the default apartment label to use in the output if there is no apartment label in the input address.
    CanFrenchApartmentLabel
    Enum to Specify For French addresses, specifies the default apartment label to use in the output if there is no apartment label in the input address.
    CanFrenchFormat
    Enum to Specify how to determine the language (English or French) to use to format the address and directional.
    CanNonCivicFormat
    Enum to specify whether or not non-civic keywords are abbreviated in the output.
    CanOutputCityAlias
    Enum to specify whether or not to return the city alias when the alias is in the input address.
    CanOutputCityFormat
    Enum to specify whether to use the long, medium, or short version of the city if the city has a long name.
    CanPreferHouseNum
    Enum to set CanPreferHouseNum
    CanRuralRouteFormat
    Enum to specify where to place rural route delivery information.
    CanSSLVRFlg
    Enum to change the civic and/or suite information to match the Large Volume Receiver (LVR) or single-single record (used when there is only one record for that postal code/street name/street type).
    CanStandardAddressFormat
    Enum to specify where to place secondary address information in the output address.
    DirectionalMatchingStrictness
    Enum to specify Specifies the algorithm to use when determining if an input address matches an address in the postal database.
    DPVDetermineNoStat
    Enum to Determine the "no stat" status of an address.
    DPVDetermineVacancy
    Enum to Determine if the location has been unoccupied for at least 90 days.
    DPVSuccessfulStatusCondition
    Enum to select the match condition where a DPV result does NOT cause a record to fail.
    DualAddressLogic
    Enum to Indicate how to return a match if multiple non-blank address lines are present or multiple address types are on the same address line.
    ExtractFirm
    Enum to specify whether to extract the firm name from AddressLine1 through AddressLine4 and place it in the FirmName output field.
    ExtractUrb
    Enum to specify whether to extract the urbanization name.
    FailOnCMRAMatch
    Enum to Treat Commercial Mail Receiving Agency (CMRA) matches as failures.
    FirmMatchingStrictness
    Enum to specify FirmMatchingStrictness
    KeepMultimatch
    Enum to set keepmultimatch options for response
    OutputAbbreviatedAlias
    Enum to specify whether to use a street's abbreviated alias in the output if the output address line is longer than 31 characters.
    OutputAddressBlocks
    Enum to set output address blocks options for response
    OutputCasing
    Enum to set OutputCasing options for response
    OutputCountryFormat
    Enum to set output country format options for response
    OutputFieldLevelReturnCodes
    Enum to set output field level return codes options for response
    OutputMultinationalCharacters
    Enum to specify whether or not to return multinational characters.
    OutputPreferredAlias
    Enum to specify whether to use a street's preferred alias in the output.
    OutputPreferredCity
    Enum to Specify whether the preferred last line city name should be stored.
    OutputRecordType
    Enum to set output record type options for response
    OutputScript
    Enum to set output script options for response
    OutputShortCityName
    Enum to specify how to format city names that have short city name or non-mailing city name alternatives.
    OutputStreetNameAlias
    Enum to specify whether or not to use a street's alias in the output.
    PerformEWS
    Enum to perform EWS processing
    PerformLACSLink
    Enum to specify the USPS® Locatable Address Conversion System (LACS) enabling, allows you to correct addresses that have changed as a result of a rural route address converting to street-style address, a PO Box renumbering, or a street-style address changing.
    PerformSuiteLink
    Enum to specify whether to perform SuiteLink™ processing.
    StandardAddressFormat
    Enum to specify where to place secondary address information for U.S.
    StandardAddressPMBLine
    Enum to specify where Private Mailbox (PMB) information is placed.
    StreetMatchingStrictness
    Enum to specify StreetMatchingStrictness
    SuppressZplusPhantomCarrierR777
    Enum to specify whether to supress addresses with Carrier Route R777.
